title: Award-Winning Maldives Paradise with All-Inclusive Dining, Free-Flow Drinks & Malé Speedboat Transfers
description:
Feel your heart swell at the unyielding beauty of the Maldives' world-famous North Malé Atoll - where the water is crystal-clear, the sands are pearly and the pace of life is relaxed. Prepare to be surprised by the utter tranquillity of this five-star resort, located just 40 minutes by speedboat from Malé.

Collectively a tropical paradise, each of the resort's traditional Maldivian villas are complete with a private sparkling pool and direct access to the azure lagoon. Embrace the island’s serene rhythm, where you can breathe in the fresh sea air, swim with manta rays, encounter hawksbill turtles and witness the majestic native nurse sharks at the resort's dive centre.

Indulge at the serene spa with an impressive menu of treatments inspired by ancient healing techniques, take a sunset cruise with your special someone or simply sink your toes into the white sand as you unwind in this tranquil haven.

Across five diverse restaurants and two bars, Coco Bodu Hithi offers a true culinary journey from gourmet finger sandwiches to exquisite fresh seafood and perfectly seared prime cuts. Recognised this year as the Indian Ocean’s Most Romantic Resort by the World Travel Awards, feel the love as you relax in the sauna or steam room, reconnect with a sunrise yoga session and toast to this dreamy coastal oasis with a stellar seafront cocktail.
offer_address: North Male Atoll, Kaafu Atoll 20079, Maldives

title: Grand Opening: Maldives Private Island Bliss with Daily Breakfast, Dinner & Drinks + Roundtrip Transfers
description:
Claim your spot as one of the first to experience true Maldivian magic at the brand-new Centara Mirage Lagoon, a private island oasis just 40 minutes from Male. Sublime cuisine headlines this tropical gem, from freshly caught seafood at Acqua to authentic Thai flavours at the signature Suan Bua, where you can indulge in a private banquet or sip on cocktails at the vibrant rum bar.

From sunrise to sunset, there's no shortage of entertainment for all - spend your days floating in the crystal-clear lagoon or dive into the thrill of the lazy river and water park. For couples and honeymooners, romance takes centre stage with sunset cruises, candlelit dinners and private villa picnics, while the acclaimed SPA Cenvaree offers next-level relaxation, complete with the magical Candy Spa to keep the little ones busy.

With convenient speedboat transfers included in your package, arriving at Centara Mirage Lagoon couldn't be easier, allowing you to make the most of your trip from the moment you land in Male. Admire the endless blue of the Indian Ocean as you glide seamlessly to your private slice of heaven, where your journey into bliss begins.
offer_address: North Male Atoll, Kodhipparu Falhu, 02077, Maldives

title: Maldives Five-Star North Male Atoll Resort with Five Dining Venues & Spa
description:
Discover the untouched beauty of the Maldives at this five-star luxury resort located in the pristine North Male Atoll. Wake up to panoramic views of the Indian Ocean from your private villa, spend your days exploring the vibrant coral reefs teeming with marine life, or savour authentic Maldivian cuisine at the resort's five gourmet restaurants.

For the ultimate relaxation, indulge in traditional treatments at the overwater spa or enjoy a private dining experience under the stars.

title: Five-Star Maldives Banyan Tree Retreat with PADI Dive Centre & House Reef
description: Castaway to paradise with a five-star stay at Banyan Tree Vabbinfaru, a secluded Maldives island retreat surrounded by snow-white sands and the endless blue beyond. Just a 20-minute catamaran ride from Malé's airport, this intimate resort includes an abundance of top-notch facilities - enjoy beachside dining at Ilaafathi and Naiboli Bar, explore vast underwater kingdoms with the on-site PADI Dive Centre or head to celebrated Banyan Tree Spa for soul-soothing treatments.
offer_address: Kaafu Atoll, North Male Atoll, Maldives
